metadata.title: CVE-2024-11168 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The urllib.parse.urlsplit() and urlparse() functions improperly validatedbracketed hosts (`[]`), allowing hosts that weren't IPv6 or IPvFuture. Thisbehavior was not conformant to RFC 3986 and potentially enabled SSRF if aURL is processed by more than one URL parser.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-11-18').
python3.10 package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-11-18').
python3.11 package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-11-18').
